metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2203 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the WebKitGTK package. An improper input validationissue may lead to a use-after-free vulnerability. This flaw allowsattackers with network access to pass specially crafted web content files,causing a denial of service or arbitrary code execution. This CVE existsbecause of a CVE-2023-28205 security regression for the WebKitGTK packagein Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.8 and Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.2.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
